name: Brad Pitt
description:
William Bradley Pitt (born December 18, 1963) is an American actor and film producer. He is the recipient of various accolades, including two Academy Awards, two British Academy Film Awards, two Golden Globe Awards, and a Primetime Emmy Award. As a public figure, Pitt has been cited as one of the most powerful and influential people in the American entertainment industry.

If you like my work, a review is more than welcome! Also, follow me on Twitter or Instagram!

Looking for something... spicy? Here's my Patreon!

Also, I recently started a blog where I will gather resources and tutorials about my work here!

Today, I am happy to present a textual inversion of Brad Pitt. He really needs no introductions, right? :) I used 70 public images of him, with an 8000 steps training process. I am pretty satisfied with the results. Hope you'll like it! To use it in your works:

  • download the file and place it into stable-diffusion-webui>embeddings folder;

  • add brapit63 to your prompt;

  • keep the sampling steps around 30, CFG at 7 seems to work well. Great results with DPM++ SDE Karras & Realistic Vision. Check the gallery for some inspiration!

Enjoy!

meta.prompt: RAW photo, a photo of brapit63 smiling, (high detailed skin:1.2), 8k UHD, DSLR, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3
